Question: Topdisk Enterprise Co.,Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Topdisk Enterprise Co.,Ltd.

Product: Topdisk Type C USB 3.1 Flash Drive

- Hardware Encryption USB Drive
- USB3.1 Gen1 high speed
- Metal material, USB3.0 super speed, support Type-C & Micro-B OTG
- Support for Lighting OTG function, dual port design
- 2020 NEW Type-C USB FLASH DRIVE

Topdisk's Type C USB 3.1 Flash Drive offers hardware encryption, high-speed USB3.1 Gen1, and support for Type-C & Micro-B OTG. The metal material and USB3.0 super speed provide durability and fast data transfer. Additionally, it supports Lighting OTG function and features a dual port design.
